entry: Enter on breakout of consolidation pattern (wedge, flag, pennant) with high relative volume.
stop: Hard stop ~0.02 below base of the pattern.
target: Measured move from pattern base; default 2:1 R:R or pattern-specific target.
trailing: Partial at first target; trail remaining leg to EMA/VWAP.
notes: Pattern detection helper recommended; may require manual review or pattern algorithm.
